JOHN 6.51 ik im hlaifs sa libanda, sa us himina qumana;
jabai ƕas matjiþ þis hlaibis, libaiþ in ajukduþ;
jah þan sa hlaifs þanei ik giba, leik mein ist þatei ik giba in þizos manasedais libainais.
JOHN 6.52 þanuh sokun miþ sis misso Iudaieis qiþandans:
ƕaiwa mag sa unsis leik giban du matjan?
JOHN 6.53 þaruh qaþ du im Iesus:
nibai matjiþ leik þis sunaus mans jah driggkaiþ is bloþ, ni habaiþ libain in izwis silbam.
JOHN 6.54 saei matjiþ mein leik jah driggkiþ mein bloþ, aih libain aiweinon, jah ik urraisja ina in þamma spedistin daga.
JOHN 6.55 þata auk leik meinata bi sunjai ist mats, jah þata bloþ mein bi sunjai ist draggk.
JOHN 6.56 saei matjiþ mein leik jah driggkiþ mein bloþ, in mis wisiþ jah ik in imma.
JOHN 6.57 swaswe insandida mik libands atta, jah ik liba in attins, jah saei matjiþ mik, jah sa libaiþ in meina.
JOHN 6.58 sa ist hlaifs saei us himina atstaig, ni swaswe matidedun attans izwarai manna jah gadauþnodedun;
iþ saei matjiþ þana hlaif libaiþ in ajukduþ.
JOHN 6.59 þata qaþ in swnagoge laisjands in Kafarnaum.
JOHN 6.60 þanuh managai gahausjandans þize siponje is qeþun:
JOHN 6.61 iþ witands Iesus in sis silbin þatei birodidedun þata þai siponjos is, qaþ du im:
JOHN 6.62 jabai nu gasaiƕiþ sunu mans ussteigan, þadei was faurþis?
JOHN 6.63 ahma ist saei liban taujiþ,
þo waurda þoei ik rodida izwis, ahma ist jah libains ist,
JOHN 6.64 akei sind izwara sumai, þaiei ni galaubjand.
wissuh þan us frumistja Iesus ƕarjai sind þai ni galaubjandans, jah ƕas ist saei galeiweiþ ina.
duþe qaþ izwis þatei ni ainshun mag qiman at mis, nibai ist atgiban imma fram attin meinamma.
JOHN 6.66 uzuh þamma mela managai galiþun siponje is ibukai jah þanaseiþs miþ imma ni iddjedun.
JOHN 6.67 þaruh qaþ Iesus du þaim twalibim:
JOHN 6.68 þanuh andhof imma Seimon Paitrus:
JOHN 6.69 jah weis galaubidedum jah ufkunþedum þatei þu is Xristus, sunus gudis libandins.
JOHN 6.71 qaþuh þan þana Iudan Seimonis, Iskariotu,
sa auk habaida ina galewjan, ains wisands þize twalibe.
JOHN 7.1 Jah ƕarboda Iesus afar þata in Galeilaia;
ni auk wilda in Iudaia gaggan, unte sokidedun ina þai Iudaieis usqiman.
JOHN 7.2 wasuh þan neƕa dulþs Iudaie, so hleþrastakeins.
JOHN 7.3 þanuh qeþun du imma broþrjus is:
usleiþ þaþro jah gagg in Iudaian, ei jah þai siponjos þeinai saiƕaina waurstwa þeina þoei þu taujis.
JOHN 7.4 ni manna auk in analaugnein ƕa taujiþ jah sokeiþ sik uskunþana wisan.
jabai þata taujis, bairhtei þuk silban þizai manasedai.
JOHN 7.5 ni auk þai broþrjus is galaubidedun imma.
iþ mel izwar sinteino ist manwu.
JOHN 7.7 ni mag so manaseþs fijan izwis,
iþ mik fijaiþ; unte ik weitwodja bi ins þatei waurstwa ize ubila sind.
JOHN 7.8 jus galeiþiþ in dulþ þo,
iþ ik ni nauh galeiþa in þo dulþ, unte meinata mel ni nauh usfulliþ ist.
JOHN 7.9 þatuh þan qaþ du im wisands in Galeilaia.
JOHN 7.10 iþ biþe galiþun þai broþrjus is, þanuh jah is galaiþ in þo dulþ ni andaugjo, ak swe analaugniba.
JOHN 7.11 þanuh Iudaieis sokidedun ina in þizai dulþai jah qeþun:
JOHN 7.12 jah birodeins mikila bi ina was in managein:
